mapper.select: /* 결제 내역 조회 */ SELECT mn.mentoring_notice_title AS noticeTitle, m.member_id AS memberId, msmc.last_amount AS payAmount, msmc.settlement_day AS paymentDate, msmc.mentoring_progress_status AS mentoringStatus FROM mentee_settlement_mentor_calculation msmc INNER JOIN mentoring_notice mn ON msmc.mentor_notice_code = mn.mentoring_notice_code INNER JOIN `member` m ON mn.member_id = m.member_id WHERE msmc.settlement_id = #{memberId};
